comments:
I am using org.apache.derby.core plugin, and when switched to I20050125/I20050126 
There were problems in my PDE development. The problem is that eclipse could not
correctly parse the "version="10.1.0.0 (124830)" found in the derby.core  
If I change the version to "10.1.0.0" everything seems ok.

Here is the trace log :

spaces are not legal in the qualifier.  OSGi declares the valid chars to be
ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789_-

You should contact the people producing the plugin.
